field.label: URL
field.helpText: The URL field for the connector helps you connect to Live Optics portal and only supports the GET operation. Project details can be fetched with the given project ID as input.

field.label: Login ID
field.helpText: An ASCII string of characters that uniquely identifies the user

field.label: Login Secret
field.helpText: A base64-encoded string for user authentication

field.label: Shared Secret
field.helpText: A second base64-encoded string that extracts the session string from the Session Login method response

field.label: Include Entities
field.helpText: If checked, individual summaries for servers in this project will be provided in the response
